title: osdady
author: osdady
content: Hello,I am a marketing specialist working specifically with crypto projects. I have 6 years of experience and a very strong team including: programmer, designer, lawyer, copywriter and shillers team.I cooperate with:• Crypto Youtubers, Influencers• Crypto callers with large audiences and a trusted name• Crypto-themed Instagram, Telegram channels and groupsMy experience and contacts give you opportunity to advertise where it would not normally be possible..I personally guarantee that my advertising will be useful and profitable for you. My Telegram: @swaptocrypto or www.t.me/swaptocrypto

comments.author: MinMan
comments.body: Please include the projects where you have spent your last 6 years. If I look for hiring a marketing specialist, that would be my first consideration.And if you are charging only with BNB then please move this topic to Marketplace (Altcoins).(Option for moving this topic is available at the bottom left side of this page).

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Seems you are pretty new to the forum but advertising your service with a high fee. Many projects come to me for marketing. So I am curious about your service. If you are a professional marketer then you should post your portfolio here for better understanding. So we may look and verify your claim whether it's true or false. Claiming work on many projects verbally won't help you to get work from the forum. Because almost everyone here is experienced in crypto.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: osdady on November 05, 2022, 04:03:50 PMHello,I am a marketing specialist working specifically with crypto projects. I have 6 years of experience and a very strong team including: programmer, designer, lawyer, copywriter and shillers team.I cooperate with:• Crypto Youtubers, Influencers• Crypto callers with large audiences and a trusted name• Crypto-themed Instagram, Telegram channels and groupsMy experience and contacts give you opportunity to advertise where it would not normally be possible..I personally guarantee that my advertising will be useful and profitable for you. My Telegram: @swaptocrypto or www.t.me/swaptocryptoFor 10 BNB and six years tell us what have you achieved, you should also have your own site if you're already running this campaign for 6 years and not only a telegram handle, professional promoters do not only have telegram, they should have a site or a social media where we can the see projects that they've worked with and help succeed you cannot guarantee something if you don't show us anything mere words will not make us believe that you're legit.

comments.author: fortunecrypto
comments.body: Quote from: osdady on November 05, 2022, 04:03:50 PMHello,I am a marketing specialist working specifically with crypto projects. I have 6 years of experience and a very strong team including: programmer, designer, lawyer, copywriter and shillers team.No, you're not a specialist, a specialist in marketing is someone who can show proof of projects that he's worked with, you did not even mention that you are willing to show projects you've worked with, with proofs even via personal message, six years and you only have this to show to us.QuoteI cooperate with:• Crypto Youtubers, Influencers• Crypto callers with large audiences and a trusted name• Crypto-themed Instagram, Telegram channels and groupsMy experience and contacts give you opportunity to advertise where it would not normally be possible..I personally guarantee that my advertising will be useful and profitable for you. My Telegram: @swaptocrypto or www.t.me/swaptocryptoMention these influencers then we will believe you, you cannot guaranty something without even showing proof what you have delivered, marketing is very important in every project but you need to show more not just this.
